name: Trumpet Trainee
description:
Trumpet Trainee was made for the GitHub Game Off 2022 game jam.

You are Bob the elephant. You're hired to do optimisations around the department, while not distracting co-workers. Make sure no one is talking to you, or you'll get fired.

Screenshots



Credits

Joris Hartog: Code
Guus van Wonderen: Sprites, Art
Tim Pool: Music, SFX, Story

Pixeloid Font by GGBotNet - https://www.fontspace.com/pixeloid-font-f69232
Franchise Font by Vladimir Nikolic - https://www.dafont.com/franchise-2.font

GitHub

All code and assets are open-source (MIT): https://github.com/nootr/game-off-2022
